text: Gayla Margolin is an American psychologist doing research on adolescence and the effect of domestic violence on children. She has also done research on coparenting and marital therapy. She is a professor of psychology and pediatrics at the University of Southern California where she leads the Family Studies Project.University of Southern California, Family Studies Project, Gayla Margolin, Ph.D. ==Education== Margolin graduated with a BA in psychology from the University of Wisconsin in 1971. She subsequently studied clinical psychology at the University of Oregon where she received an MA in 1973 and a PhD in 1976.University of Southern California, Department of Psychology, Gayla Margolin == Selected publications == ===Books=== * Jacobson NS, Margolin G.
